entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 12:47 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with snow changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
